page.title: 18HIPPERHOLME LIBRARY
page.content: The building which is now Hipperholme Library used to be Council offices until 1930. There are 9567 books in the library altogether and 1867 members borrow books. There were two lady librarians working at the library when we went and one said she had worked there 27 years. They both enjoyed their work. The most popular books were gardening, cookery, travel books and books about Famous people. Also in the Library there are some newspapers and you can get information on the area. To track down the books, they look in the catalogue for the number.
